headline.main: RED CROSS SPENT $16,690,000 ON WAR; It Gave Cash and Supplies to Victims in Nine Countries During the Year SENT BRITAIN $8,972,000 Surgical Dressings and Garments Were Shipped to Ease the Suffering

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 31 -- During the year the American Red Cross gave $16,690,000 in cash and supplies to the war victims and refugees of nine countries, it announced today.
abstract: Amer Red Cross fund drive: rept on war relief aid, 1940
snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 31 -- During the year the American Red Cross gave $16,690,000 in cash and supplies to the war victims and refugees of nine countries, it announced today....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
